ValidationRule.description: Prevents Account Exec Profile from creating Opportunities on Accounts they do not. BAM & Frontier Sales.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), Account.OwnerId <> "005E00000066ttB", OwnerId <> Account.OwnerId, OwnerId <> Account.Owner.ManagerId, ($User.ProfileId = '00e0h000001WfvO' || $User.ProfileId = '00e0h000001WfeA' || $User.ProfileId = '00eE0000001A8C8' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not the owner of this Company. Therefore you cannot create an Opportunity related to it.
